title: It’s Not a Waste!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>I shouldn’t waste money, I shouldn’t waste money.... Uuu, but~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>You look serious Hanayo-chan, what’s up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Kotori-chan.... I’m just trying to remind myself to not waste money....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Did you waste money on something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>No, but I think I’m about to.... You see, there’s this headband from a brand that I like that’s really cute. It has this polar bear holding a strawberry on it.... Here it is.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Waaah~! How cute! It’s so cute, Hanayo-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Isn’t it? I thought if I can wear this when I wash my face, I’ll wake up excited every morning!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I can totally see that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>But, I have the one I’m using right now, and I want to buy idol goods too, so I have to hold back....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I see.... But I kind of want to see you wear this, Hanayo-chan.... It’ll look good on you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Look good....? If it’s about whether it’ll look good or not, I think it’ll fit you better, though, Kotori-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>That’s not true, it’ll definitely fit you, Hanayo-chan! Just having something cute can cheer you up. So I don’t see it as a waste.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>R-, really, is that so~.... Then.... maybe I’ll buy it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
